name: Alder Apparel
description: Operator of an online shopping platform intended to offer clothes for all sizes. The company's platform provides inclusive sizing, female-focused design, sustainable and ethical production, and a playful brand, enabling customers to be comfortable in their clothes.
one_liner: Operator of an online shopping platform intended to offer clothes for all sizes. The company's platform provides inclusive sizing, female-focused design, sustainable and ethical production, and a playful brand, enabling customers to be comfortable in their clothes.
